project.name: Maven :: Plugins :: Multiple OSs Enforcer Rule
project.description: This Project implements a custom enforcer rule to bypass the classic "requireOs" section of the enforcer plugin by allowing to define a range of allowed Operating Systems: [windows,linux] Check the "rule" module for the implementation of the EnforcerRule and the "showcase" module descriptor ("pom.xml") to check how to use the new rule. More on maven enforcer rules: http://maven.apache.org/enforcer/enforcer-api/writing-a-custom-rule.html
